title: Fossil Group (NASDAQ:FOSL) Director Buys $102,065.34 in Stock
description: Fossil Group, Inc. (NASDAQ:FOSL – Get Free Report) Director Wendy Lee Schoppert bought 41,322 shares of the stock in a transaction on Thursday, November 20th. The stock was purchased at an average price of $2.47 per share, for a total transaction of $102,065.34. Following the purchase, the director directly owned 43,788 shares of the company’s [...]

title: An ancient Maya myth finds new life in a Mexican circus company’s performance
description: Mexican artistic director Jorge Díaz used to have a unique selection of bedtime stories for his son. Setting aside well-known books like “Pinocchio,” they read tales closer to home. Among their favorites was the Popol Vuh, a compendium of sacred Maya myths. “Recalling those stories is important,” said Díaz, whose grandmother told him legends from [...]The post An ancient Maya myth finds new life in a Mexican circus company’s performance appeared first on MACAU DAILY TIMES 澳門每日時報.

title: Crypto Prediction Markets Aren’t Just Fancy Gambling; They’re a Revival of an Ancient Human Superpower
description: Prediction markets tap into the oldest human edge: the ability to read patterns, weigh risks, and bet your own skin on what comes next. Hunters who could forecast animal migrations ate. Traders who smelled a drought coming got rich. Generals who guessed the enemy’s next move won wars. Being right about the future used to [...]The post Crypto Prediction Markets Aren’t Just Fancy Gambling; They’re a Revival of an Ancient Human Superpower appeared first on Tekedia.
